It seems like the image for the tab start and tab end is not long enough so that the background color shines through. I'll attach a screenshot which will make it more clear.

Reproducible: Always

comments.author: blaisekal@gmail.com
comments.creator: blaisekal@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
It only seems to happen only when you have plugins in your navigation toolbar before you upgraded. Removing and re-adding the toolbar buttons solved the problem. 

I had these buttons in my toolbar: Flashblock, Adblock Plus and Xmarks Synchronize Now.
comments.text:
It only seems to happen only when you have plugins in your navigation toolbar before you upgraded. Removing and re-adding the toolbar buttons solved the problem. 

I had these buttons in my toolbar: Flashblock, Adblock Plus and Xmarks Synchronize Now.

comments.raw_text:
No, Default Mac theme without modifications. "Use small icons" unchecked.

(I couldn't make a screenshot because when I was cleaning up for the screenshot, the issue was also gone)
comments.author: blaisekal@gmail.com
